name: Glooth Powered Minotaur
behaviour: It fights in close combat like a stronger [[Moohtant]].
location: Second floor [[Glooth Underground Factory]], east side during a [[Glooth Factory Raids#Minotaur Raid|minotaur raid]].
strategy:
This creature cannot be killed in this form, however, it can be weakened into a [[Depowered Minotaur]]. To do so, lure the Glooth Powered Minotaur to one of the many [[Glooth Extractor]]s around the cave. It will become a Depowered Minotaur as soon as it steps on it, and the weak version can be easily killed. 

Note that if there are [[Minotaur Totem]]s around, you should deal with them first since they heal all creatures around it.
